This is amazing work by the @0xPolygon team.

Props to @jbaylina @bobbinth @dlubarov and others for all the contributions they have made to ZK broadly to make this possible!

A type 1 prover, simply put, is a program that shares Ethereum's logic, that shows that the computers running Ethereum did the right thing, without having to modify (fork) anything.

It can generate proofs for any EVM chain, with extremely low fees from $0.002 - $0.003 per txn.

Type 1 prover means the highest level of compatibility with Eth. 

It means connecting L2 to L2 to L1 EVM to Eth.

And the zkEVM prover will do it for an average per-tx cost of $0.003 with a 30 to 50X reduction on the horizon.

Interop grail.
